QueryResult.text: SELECT AP.ID, NLS.LANGUAGE_CODE, AP.PARM_ID, AP.REPORT_ID, NLS.NAME RPTPARMLABEL, AP.DEFAULTVAL, AP.REQUIRED, AP.RODPARMCODE, AP.SORT_ORDER, AP.CREATED_DATE, AP.CREATED_BY, AP.LAST_UPDATED_DATE, AP.LAST_UPDATED_BY FROM CMN_CAPTIONS_NLS NLS, CMN_RPT_ASSIGN_PARAMETERS AP WHERE NLS.TABLE_NAME = 'CMN_RPT_ASSIGN_PARAMETERS' AND NLS.PK_ID = AP.ID
